Robles García, J E
Isa Kroon, W A
de Castro Barbosa, F
Berián Polo, J M
Zudaire Bergera, J J
metadata.dc:description: A case of urothelial carcinoma in pelvic ectopic kidney is described. The low incidence of both pathologies and their rare association justifies the description.
metadata.dc:title: Tumor de pelvis renal en riñón ectópico. A propósito de un caso.
[Kidney pelvis tumor in ectopic kidney. Report of a case].
